content: The skeleton ice cube tray will send chills down your spine in more ways than one. This eerie tray creates one of a kind skeleton ice cube that features a silicone spine so you can make him do a delightful macabre dance before he chills your drink.

Next time you’re looking to set the mood, skip the candles and go straight for the color changing flower lights. These delightful roses are small LED lamps that emit a soft glow ideal for illuminating a small area without causing a possible fire hazard.

Escape the dull and monotonous glow of your office’s fluorescent lights with the faux sky light diffusers. These cheerful panels display pleasant images of mother nature at her best. Instead of a sterile yellow glow, you’ll be able to gaze up and enjoy a perfect summer sky.

Give your home the middle finger every time you lock the front door with this middle finger key. This novelty key comes blank so you can custom fit it to your home’s lock – making it a fun little house warming gift for somebody with a tendency for curse words.

Enjoy dessert on a nightly basis by satisfying your sweet tooth with the giant ice cream cone lamp. This tasty lamp stands 28 inches in height and comes in three delicious and flavors – chocolate, vanilla and strawberry. It makes a fun accent for any room in the home.

Wield control over the Eternal Dragon with the Dragon Ball Z replica ball. These expertly crafted Dragonballs measure about 3 inches in diameter and look identical to their cartoon counterparts. It’s the ultimate gift for any fan of the show or villain seeking immortality.

Who needs sunlight when you’ve got the mega flashlight emergency station at your disposal? It comes equipped with an impressive stay-cool 120-watt halogen bulb that is so powerful it’ll practically turn the night into day – and built-in USB outlets for charging electronic devices.

Protect your phone while simultaneously looking like a true baller with the hundred dollar bill iPhone case. The case is emblazoned with a picture of good old Ben Franklin and allows access to the camera and all available ports on your smartphone.

Practice your mathematical abilities every time you check the time with the math equation watch. This cleverly designed watch replaces the hours with equations equal to that number. It adds a fun spin to telling the time and makes a great gift for the math nerd in your life.

Your drink is always just a little bit too warm for your tastes. You need a classy straw to take care of your drink and make it just a little more fabulous. The icy straw will solve your temperature issues by keeping your mai tai nice and freezy.

Pop open your mouth watering beer bottles with military-like precision using the green Army man bottle opener. Constructed out of a durable die-cast metal, this nostalgic green Army man toy has been re-assigned from children’s play time to adult’s drinking time.

Prevent having dirty dog prints all over your clean floor with the dog paw wash tool. This painless yet extremely effective device works by simply placing your dog’s paws in the tube filled with soap and water – a fluid dynamic suction then quickly takes off the dirt.

Raking up the leaves in the yard will be a breeze with the leaf bag loader. The leaf loader acts like a funnel that greatly facilitates getting all the leaves into the bag. It’s remarkably simple to use and helps you get the job done quicker than ever.

Your dog knows how to swim, but does he know how to float? Probably not — that’s a human skill from swim lessons. With this innovative and comfortable dog life jacket you can be sure there are never any tragic accidents at the lake or ocean.

Put your signature touch – literally – on the edible masterpiece you cooked up with the personalized BBQ branding iron. This unique branding iron can be customized with a variety of letters so the grill master can write just about anything on his delicious work of art.

Kids need to stop worrying about fictitious boogie mans and start worrying about real threats like toilet monsters. This easy to apply decal displays a curious monster peeking at you from inside the toilet – a hilarious joke to play on the kids and the rest of the family.

Take your favorite games on the go with the iPhone gaming controller. This cool add-on transforms your iPhone into a mobile gaming console that’ll provide hours of entertainment. The controller comes equipped with everything you need to enjoy precision mobile gaming.

We’re in the 21st century, it’s time to throw out that old dated candy bowl and replace it with the motion activated candy dispenser. This fabulous machine let’s you satisfy your sweet tooth with a simple wave of the hand and includes different setting for portion control.

There’s no need for the gym if you want to look slimmer, all you need is the hand squeeze shirt. This comical shirt displays an over sized hand graphic squeezing your midsection like an empty soda can. It’s perfect for getting noticed and having a laugh.

Get blackout wasted in record time when you show up to the party armed with the alcohol shot gun. Just pour a shot of your favorite liquor, cock, aim and shoot – it’s the most entertaining and efficient way to deliver massive amounts of alcohol to the body.

After a long day of gaming, you’ll sleep like a newborn baby once you wrap yourself in the Super Mario blanket. This soft, vibrant, and comfortable polyester blanket features a neat and lighthearted Super Mario design great for gamers of all ages and skill level.

Throw out those wimpy incense sticks and mood setting candles – you’re a beer drinking, testosterone oozing man and you should shower like one with the crude oil shower gel. It’s made from the same stuff that destroys the environment and kills off weak marine life.

Why settle for a boring Post-It notes when you can get your point across on the human hand sticky notes. These palm-sized sticky notes let you jot down quick memos and reminders on a notepad designed like a human hand. It’s ideal for those always writing on their hands.

The hidden lipstick knife is one make-up accessory that conceals a lot more than just blemishes. Upon opening and twisting the lipstick, a razor sharp knife reveals itself in place of actual lipstick. It’s a must have discrete self defense weapon for any woman.

Keep your bundle of joy calm and looking more bad-ass than ever with the cowboy mustache pacifier. This novelty pacifier features a quality silicone teat designed for brand new humans up to 6 months old. Your baby will be the talk to the sandbox sporting this righteous ‘stache.

Use the Force to out bankrupt the competition when you play the Star Wars edition Monopoly. It combines the intergalactic action of the Star Wars movies with the classic property trading action of Monopoly to provide hours of fun followed by abrupt rage quitting.

Stop looking like a sloppy drunk, now you can keep your drink intact with the spill proof martini glass. This hand blown martini glass features a special design to help keep the contents of your drink inside the glass, that way you can move with greater ease.

Add a little love to the beverages and cocktails you create with the heart shaped ice cubes. The mold makes up to 14 miniature ice hearts and is made from heat resistant silicone – making it great for whipping up some delicious heart shaped treats.

Create an appealing contemporary look in your home’s bathroom with the color changing waterfall faucet. The flat and angled design of the faucet allows the water to gently cascade over the sink while strategically placed lights give the water a luminescent quality.

titleEN: Keep Calm And Carry On Bandages
content: When you suffer your next minor cut or scrape, help keep moral up with the “Keep Calm and Carry On” bandages. These stylish bandages are available in various colors and display the iconic WWII era slogan to help you through the ordeal – after all, it’s just a boo boo.

If you look up gratuitously unnecessary technology in the dictionary, you’ll find a picture of the egg replacement reminder smart tray. The tray allows you to check your egg supply levels from your smart phone while you’re at the grocery store, or anywhere for that matter.

Poke fun at your debilitating mental handicap with the “Ask about my ADD” t-shirt. This internet favorite features a classic setup followed by random sentences about absolutely random thoughts on a comfortable and stylish 100% pre-shrunk cotton t-shirt.

Don’t suffer through another Thanksgiving where the turkey is cold, the potatoes are lukewarm, and only the green beans are hot — the three tier oven rack can heat all three at the same time. This excellent rack truly extends the usefulness of your oven space.

The biometric gun storage box is the most convenient way to safely store your handgun while still allowing for quick and easy access in the event of an emergency. It keeps the gun out of reach from children, but allows you to access it with just the touch of your finger.

Now you can enjoy your favorite tropical fruit without having to deal with the carving of the tough exterior. This ingenious device drills through the pineapple so you’re left with nice juicy slices in just seconds. It’s the most convenient way to enjoy this delicious fruit.

Keep your valuables safe by stashing them away in plain sight with the hidden book safe. Upon opening the book, a small compartment is revealed – ideal for hiding cash and small valuables. It’s also lightweight and highly portable, making it excellent for travel.

The runny nose yolk separator lets you make some delicious and healthy egg white omelettes while grossing out everyone around you. Once the eggs are poured into the pot, the yolk gets safely separated while the egg white drips out the nose like snot.

The bearded Barbarian knight hat comes in handy whether your goal is to keep warm, look stylish, or ransack the nearest Walmart. This knight hat covers your entire head with a distinguished warrior’s helmet, complemented by a burly and respectable beard.

It might be beautiful outdoors, but we all know you’d rather be indoors gaming. Now you can bring your favorite old school portable gaming console with you while you soak up some sun with this geeky Game Boy towel. It’s the ultimate towel for the pale skinned gamer.

Spice up your next manicure by opting for the glitter nail polish instead of the old fashioned french manicure. This bold shade of nail polish contains a multicolored glitter shade that leaves nails bright and vibrant – it’s like a party in a bottle.

Bring a small piece of the ’80s into the new millennium with the retro transparent neon phone. This stylish model put’s all the “high-tech” inner workings of the phone on display through a transparent shell. It’s a phone as innovative and colorful as the ’80s themselves.

When you need a break from TV but still want a good laugh, the Unnecessary Quotation Marks book delivers page after page of hilarious content. This entertaining read delivers various examples of quotations used for sarcastic and suggestive purposes.

You may not be a genius billionaire playboy, but you can still command the deadliest flying suit in the Marvel universe without breaking the bank with the affordable Iron Man flying suit. The sky’s the limit as you take control of the famous crimson and gold suit.

You may not be the quickest gun in the west, but with the beer holster belt you can be the drunkest. This useful accessory straps on to any belt and holds your beer in a high quality rugged leather holster so your hands remain free when you’re not chugging your drink.

Lookout, it’s the Catzilla sweatshirt! – And it’s come to make you more hip and fashionable than you ever thought possible. This action packed sweatshirt displays the mighty Catzilla terrorizing a modern metropolis with his catastrophic laser vision.

Terrorize friends and family with the light up radio control shark. This mechanized carnivore comes to life in the dark. When the lights go off, the shark glows bright as he swiftly swims across the floor, fiercely chomping its jaws while in search of its next prey.

Keep up with the young whippersnappers of hip hop music with the a little help from the “Understand Rap” book. This helpful guide breaks apart rap songs verse by verse to explain their meaning in proper English, so you can finally understand popular rap songs.

Maintain kitchen cutlery sharper than Jaw’s teeth with the shark knife sharpener. The sleek design of the sharpener goes well in any kitchen and provides an amusing way to keep your knife set as sharp as the day you bought them.

Make your world come alive with the MaKey MaKey invention kit. It transforms everyday objects into touch pads you can combine with the internet. It’s the 21st century invention kit that is perfect for people of any skill set – from beginners to expert engineers.

Carry your goodies on your goodies using the bra with pockets. This sexy and functional bra is perfect for a night out on the town when you’ll be wearing an outfit that doesn’t offer pockets. Combine it with a phone case wallet and you can have everything you need right in your bra.

Get into the best shape of your short lived life when you embark on the self destructive journey outlined in the drunk diet. This diet will have you drinking, chugging, and snorting your way to a thinner you. You may die young, but at least you’ll look great.

Get nostalgic with your alcoholic adventures using the NES cartridge flask. This geeky yet discreet drinking flask resembles a retro NES cartridge and is available in a variety of parody video game labels such as “Drunk Hunt” and “The Legend of Drink”.

Whip up some delicious out of this world cookies with the Star Wars vehicles cookie cutters. You’ll be able to create your very own edible fleet of X-Wings, Millennium Falcons and Death Stars no Rebel Fighter or Imperial Stormtrooper would turn down.

With the flip out TV wall mount there will be no need to compromise on the issue of having a television in the room. The wall mount’s unique design allows you to conceal the TV behind a tasteful portrait that easily folds out every time you wish to watch something.

With the corksicle wine bottle chiller you’ll be able to keep your favorite wines nice and cool without the use of a clunky ice bucket. This innovative chiller fills up with ice and is then inserted directly into the bottle to cool the wine in the most efficient way possible.

Ensure the next party you throw becomes the stuff of legends with the Jägermeister shot dispenser. This efficient shot delivery system dispenses ice cold shots of sweet Jäger from a state of the art tap that’s stylish, easy to clean, and ready to use.

Keep the grill looking like new by unleashing the barbecue grill cleaning robot after every use. This pint size little robot boasts three powerful electric motors in addition to smart computer technology to ensure the entire surface gets evenly cleaned.

Save a bundle on snacks by using the popsicle maker to create some delicious and refreshing treats your kids will love. The set includes 4 brightly colored popsicle molds you can fill up with your favorite flavors and fruits to create healthy snacks the whole family will enjoy.

Place the ideal finishing touch on any antique lamp you own with the vintage light bulbs. These vintage bulbs bring the past and present together. They showcase an early twentieth century design yet are made using modern energy saving technology.

The cat hammock is the perfect way to keep your fluffy family member comfy and happy without having to display unsightly pet furniture in the living room. The ingenious design allows you to convert the unused area under any chair into a cozy nook your cat will love.

It’s about time adults got their own sippy cup. After all, an inebriated adult is just as likely to spill their drink as their 2 year old toddler. The beer sippy cup allows you to drink without spilling a single drop while the double insulated tumbler keep your hands dry and beer cold.

Turn heads wherever you go with the hand bra shirt. The shirt’s eye catching design creates the illusion that the only thing standing between your boobies and the world is a pair of strategically placed hands. Truly a great way to show off your bod without actually doing so.

In these modern times, why should your dog have to live like some sort of savage animal? Well, thanks to the the dog house air conditioning unit he won’t have to. This mini unit connects to the dog house and fills up the small and overheated space with ice cold air.

What better way to serve your out-of-this-world chips and dip than on the moon bowl. The 14″  bowl is decorated with a realistic image of the moon’s surface and is great for entertaining or everyday use. One small step for man, one giant leap for serving bowls.

Carry around your crime fighting weapons and tools – or school supplies – in a half shell with the Ninja Turtles backpack. Whether you’re preparing an attack on the Foot clan or just need to carry your textbooks around, the Ninja Turtles backpack is up for the job.

Keep an eye on your blind spots while bicycling through congested areas with the bicyclist rear view mirror. This clever tool attaches onto your arm and provides a simple but effective way to watch out for cars, motorcycles, or just about anything that poses a threat to you.

Become a true sandwich artist and go prehistoric with your sandwich shaping with the dinosaur sandwich cutter. This fun tool is perfect for molding your peanut butter and jelly sandwiches into cute and delicious dinos that your children will love.

Achieve autonomous aerial reconnaissance with this unique quadricopter drone that allows for a GoPro camera to be attached to it. The first person point of view GoPro camera combined with the stable flight of the quadricopter will provide absolutely stunning visuals.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Path Markers
content: Light up any pathway in your home with the glow in the dark path markers. This captivating yet practical set includes everything you need to lay down an aesthetically pleasing path of markers that requires no batteries – or running electricity – to shine all night long.

Pay tribute to the Tom and Jerry cartoons by adding the mouse hole decal to your home. This cartoon inspired design is just what the plain walls in your home or office have been begging for. They’re easy to apply, won’t damage the paint, and are great for kids rooms.

Keep your important documents safe and secure at all times with the concealed pocket socks. Whether you’re travelling abroad or happen to be walking by a sketchy neighborhood, these socks will safely conceal your cash, passport, ID, etc. from prying eyes.

If you’ve grown tired of the garden variety lawn ornaments, the mooning garden gnome is just what you need to spruce up the yard. This little stinker may be an outcast among his fellow gnomes, but he’s exactly what you’ve been looking for to piss off the neighborhood.

Make meal time more entertaining with the subtle whimsy of the fish utensils. Each creatively designed stainless steel utensil is made to resemble a gentle underwater creature. This 5-piece set is ideal for any nautically themed kitchen or summer home.

Create your own party island wherever you go with the inflatable interlocking tubes. These tubular tubes each feature two strategically placed cup holders and can be interlocked with one another on all sides. They’ll make any day at the beach or pool unforgettable.

Add a little flair to your car with the LED tire valve caps. Each cap contains a small waterproof neon blue LED that creates a cool illumination effect when the wheels are in motion, and will guarantee your car gets a spot in the next Fast and Furious movie.

It’s time to get serious about taco night. If you love Mexican food, these specially designed plates are an absolute must. Each taco plate neatly props up your tacos while also offering a separate compartments for side dishes such as rice and re-fried beans.

Let fate decide all your financial decisions with the 50-50 bank. Simply drop your coins at the top of the bank, and watch as your financial future is decided before your very eyes. The 50-50 bank comes with two dry erase boards so you can customize your saving goals.

Get your infant ahead of the curve from day one with Calculus for Infants. This amusing booklet will teach your child the introductory lessons of calculus – giving them a noticeable advantage that will easily last throughout their pre-kindergarten academic career.

The Dark Knight is back, and ready for bathing suit season. The officially licensed Batman string swimsuit features the iconic bat symbol over the bikini top and features a black and yellow motif to capture the essence of the caped crusader’s classic outfit.

The mini donut maker provides a great way of removing the middle man from your weight gain goals. This portable home bakery is remarkably simple to use, producing a delicious batch of thirty mini donuts in less than two minutes – making it great for quick party snacks.

Bring absolute precision to your baking sessions by measuring out ingredients on the digital spoon scale. The spoon provides exact measurements in both grams and ounces simply by placing ingredients on the detachable plastic scooper found on this clever utensil.

Keep those farm fresh eggs on display and at hand with the spiral egg rack. The captivating design accommodates up to 20 medium to large sized eggs and allows you to stack them in order of freshness so you’re guaranteed a tasty meal.

Shoot open some beer bottles in the manliest way possible with the .50 caliber bottle opener. This re-purposed .50 caliber cartridge bottle opener is as durable and dependable as the military grade brass it’s made from. It’s truly a tool no soldier or civilian should be without.

Kick it old school with the boombox wristwatch and give yourself a little dose of audible flair to your outfit. The digital watch is shaped like a classic 1980’s boombox and features realistic boombox details, right down to the moving handle.

Become an organized handy-man around the house with the post-it note roller. This clever roller sticks onto almost any wall or door ,and unlike most standard sticky pads, it allows you to customize the length of the paper depending on what you need to write.

The blue canary night light will provide you with a soothing glow to fall asleep to without leaving any unwanted droppings on your floor. The canary remains perched atop the wall socket to provide ambient lighting and features a motion sensor to help conserve energy.

Get the kids to spend more time playing outdoors by placing them in the inflatable bumper balls. With these bubbly suits, your kids will finally be able to roughhouse all they want without risking hurting each other – or listening to their parents tell them not to.

Hard drugs just became obsolete – introducing the world’s strongest coffee. Perfect for those extra busy days, this powerful roast is 200% stronger than regular blends and can keep you up for 3 days straight, as long as you don’t mind the occasional heart attack.

Make the most delicious – and dangerous – treats in the galaxy with the Dalek cupcake wraps and toppers. These custom designed wraps and toppers transform your baked goods into pint sized versions of the sinister extraterrestrials known as the Daleks.

Keep your life and dipping sauce perfectly balanced with the yin and yang dipping plate. The creative design of the plate is shaped like the yin and yang symbol, allowing you to enjoy two different kinds of sauces without mixing them together when you dip your bread.

Walk, jog, or run with your furry friend  the smart way with the hands free dog leash. The leash attaches to a special belt around worn your waist, ensuring Rex stays tethered to you while your hands remain free. It’s ideal for scenic runs with your loyal jogging partner.

You may not be at Burger King, but you can have it your way with the dual temperature mattress. This unique mattress allows you to share a bed with your significant other while still keeping your preferred sleeping temperature intact.

Whoever said don’t bring a knife to a gun fight clearly never laid their eyes on the skull knuckle knife. The razor sharp stainless steel 8″ blade is of the highest quality and rests on a demonic looking zinc alloy skull handle, and comes with a specialized nylon sheath.

Don’t let your alcohol addiction slow down your active lifestyle – now you can play a round of golf and stay drunk off your ass at the same time with the golf club drink dispenser. The club dispenser allows you to discretely sneak a drink or two as you take on the golf course.

Need a non-lethal self defense weapon? There’s <del>an app</del> a case for that – introducing the pepper spray iPhone case. Designed for the modern day city dweller, this case features a strategically placed pepper spray dispenser that activates with the push of a button.

Celebrate one of Hollywood’s most beloved psychopaths with the Micheal Myers bloody snowglobe. The snowglobe commemorates the twenty some odd years of killing he’s committed for our enjoyment. Simply shake it up and watch as it rains blood.

The recessed power outlets help accommodate modern flat screen TVs and other contemporary furniture better than standard outlets. They’re designed with sunken sockets to allow flat screens and other monitors to be mounted directly over the socket without sticking out.

Throw out your lame golden chalice and drink like a mighty warlord with the viking drinking horn. This epic 24 ounce beverage holder is shaped like the tusk of an elephant, and is rumored to emanate the shouts of fallen vikings if you hold the drinking horn up to your ear.

Freeze! As you wait for the gun shaped ice cubes to cool your drink. The silicone mold makes a batch of six handgun shaped ice cubes to add a bit of spice to any drink. They’re great whether your aim is to amuse guests or make a killer drink at the NRA meeting.

Freshen your car up with the most chemically pure and stable air freshener product on the market. Once you partner up with the Heisenberg car air freshener, his ominous appearance will deter car thieves while his strawberry scent freshens up the car.
